Subskills.name: Lung Capacity
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using trickshot.

Subskills.name: Tenacity
Subskills.description: Reduces the mana cost of trickshot.

Subskills.name: Sniper's Touch
Subskills.description: Trickshot no longer bounces but multiplies its damage with the amount of bounces with increased damage and critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Lethal Aim
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by trickshot.

Subskills.name: Archery Skills
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bounces for trickshot.

Subskills.name: Looping Shot
Subskills.description: Trickshot can hit the same monster multiple times if there are no others nearby with reduced damage.

Subskills.name: Deadly Accuracy
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by trickshot.

Subskills.name: Steady Hands
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike chance when using trickshot.

Subskills.name: Powershot
Subskills.description: The initial projectile now pierces with increased range and damage unleashing bouncing arrows to monsters on hit dealing decreased damage.

Subskills.name: Agile Hunter
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using trickshot.

Subskills.name: Maiming Shot
Subskills.description: Trickshot inflicts a portion of its damage as bleeding.

Subskills.name: Splitting Trickshot
Subskills.description: Each bounce fires additional piercing projectiles.

Subskills.name: Scorching Arrow
Subskills.description: Trickshot now inflicts burning to monsters for a portion of its damage.
